dataset.title: Abortion Statistics
dataset.description: Abortion statistics measure the number of induced abortions that occur in New Zealand hospitals or licensed abortion clinics.

distribution.title: Infoshare data tool
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Health, and Group: Abortion Statistics - ABN

dataset.title: Accommodation Survey
dataset.description: This provides statistics on guest night numbers, capacity and occupancy rates of hotels, motels, backpacker accommodation, and holiday parks in New Zealand each month. These statistics are used by regional tourism organisations, local and national government and the accommodation industry for monitoring and planning.

distribution.title: Accommodation survey time series data
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Tourism, and Group: Accommodation Survey - ACS

distribution.title: January 2019 - RTO and accommodation type pivot table
distribution.description: RTO: Regional tourism operator

distribution.title: January 2019 - RTO and origin pivot table
distribution.description: RTO: Regional tourism operator

dataset.title: Agricultural Production Statistics
dataset.description: These releases contain information on farming in New Zealand - including livestock and arable farming, horticulture, and forestry. Agricultural production statistics are produced in collaboration with the Ministry for Primary Industries.

distribution.title: Industry data by regional and local authorities
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Industry sectors, and select Group: Agriculture - AGR

distribution.title: Livestock slaughtering statistics
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Industry sectors, and Group: Livestock slaughtering - LSS

distribution4.description: Select Subject category: Industry sectors, and Group: Primary Production - PRP

dataset.title: Alcohol  Available for Consumption
dataset.description: These releases provide estimates of the quantity of alcoholic beverages and tobacco available for consumption in New Zealand. As the tobacco available for consumption series was discontinued in September 2010, for reasons of confidentiality, the release title was changed accordingly.

distribution.title: Alcohol available for consumption time series data
distribution.description: Subject category: Industry sectors, and Group: Alcohol available for consumption - ALC

dataset.title: Annual Balance Sheets
dataset.description: These provide estimates of assets, liabilities and net worth held by New Zealand institutional sectors (e.g. businesses, households and government) at a single point in time

dataset.title: Annual Enterprise Survey
dataset.description: The ongoing Annual Enterprise Survey (AES) is New Zealand's most comprehensive source of financial statistics and provides annual financial performance and financial position information about business operation within New Zealand. Its coverage is around 80% of New Zealand's Gross Domestic Product (GDP).

dataset.title: Balance of Payments and International Investment Position
dataset.description: These statistics provide records of the value of the country's transactions with the rest of the world in goods, services, income, and transfers. They also record changes in New Zealand's financial claims on (assets), and liabilities to, the rest of the world

distribution.title: Balance of payment time series data
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Economic indicators, and Group: Balance of payments - BOP; or Group: International investment position - IIP

dataset.title: Births
dataset.description: These measure the number of births  registered in New Zealand. Birth and statistics provide local authorities, health authorities, and research institutions with information needed to plan future and current social services.

distribution.title: Birth time series data
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Population, and Group: Births - VSB, or Group: Birth rates - DFM

distribution.title: Births data by statistical area 2 and area unit (comparison)

dataset.title: Building Consents Issued
dataset.description: This information release contains statistics on consents for residential and non-residential buildings by region and building type. It includes the number, value and floor area of new residential dwellings, and the value of consents for residential alterations and additions. It also includes the value of consents for non-residential buildings, and the floor area of new non-residential buildings

distribution.title: Building consents time series data
distribution.description: Subject category: Industry sectors, and Group: Building consents - BLD

dataset.title: Business Activity (GST) Indicator Series
dataset.description: These releases provide information on business activity in New Zealand, by industry. The Business Activity Indicator is derived from goods and services tax (GST) data. These releases were suspended in 2002.

dataset.title: Business Operations Survey
dataset.description: The Business Operations Survey is to collect performance measures from New Zealand businesses to better understand the practices and behaviours they undertake which may have an impact on their performance. These statistics feed into policy and micro data research that helps identify the current situation of the New Zealand business environment, as well as potential areas of improvement. The survey covers all businesses in New Zealand that have 6 more employees, and have been active for one year or more.
dataset.theme: Business, Economy, Industries, Information and communication technology, Research and development

distribution.title: Business Operations time series data
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Business, and Group: Business operations survey - BUO

dataset.title: Business Price Indexes
dataset.description: This combines the producers price index (PPI) and capital goods price index (CGPI) information releases into one quarterly business price index information release.   The PPI provides information on the change in the general level of prices for the productive sector of New Zealand. The CGPI provides information on changes in the general price level of fixed capital assets.

distribution.title: PPI, CEP or FPI data
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Economic indicators, and Group: Producers price index - PPI or Group: Capital goods price index - CEP.  Select Subject category: Industry sectors and Group: Farm inputs - FPI

dataset.title: Census of International Trade in Services and Royalties
dataset.description: This is a census of all New Zealand businesses that either export or import commercial services and/or receive or make payments abroad for royalties.

dataset.title: Central Government Enterprise Survey
dataset.description: This collects data on the financial transactions of Crown entities. The data collected by this survey is needed to compile quarterly and annual statistics on the performance of the New Zealand economy, such as calculating gross domestic product (GDP) and statistics on Crown research institutes.

dataset.title: Child and Youth Prosecution Statistics - tables (NZ.Stat)
dataset.description: The Ministry of Justice provides data to Stats NZ about children (aged 10-13) and young people (aged 14-16) charged in court for official release on the Stats NZ website.  Children and young people who are convicted of an offence in the District or High Court are included in the Youth Prosecution Statistics as well as those whose charges are proved in the Youth Court. All numbers in the Youth Prosecution Statistics are rounded to the nearest multiple of three, with the exception of zeroes, which remain as zeroes. The Youth Court is closed to the public, so any details that may identify an individual young person cannot be reported.

distribution.title: Children & youth charged in court
distribution.description: Statistics on the most serious prosecution outcome (across all offence categories) during a fiscal year, by offence category

distribution.title: Children & youth given an order in court
distribution.description: Statistics on the most serious court order given (across all offence categories) during a fiscal year, by offence category.

dataset.title: Civil unions
dataset.description: Civil union statistics measure the number of civil unions registered in New Zealand. Civil unions may be entered into by couples of the same sex or by couples of different sexes.

distribution.title: Infoshare data tool
distribution.description: Subject category: Population, and Group: Marriages, civil unions, and divorces - VSM

dataset.title: Consumers Price Index
dataset.description: These releases provide information on the price change of goods and services purchased by private New Zealand households.  The CPI is used to help set monetary policy and for monitoring economic performance. Employers and employees use the CPI in wage negotiations.

distribution.title: Infoshare data tool
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Economic indicators, and Group: Consumers price index

distribution.title: CPI and FPI back series
distribution.description: Dataset - published 30 November 2017

dataset.title: Criminal Conviction and Sentencing Statistics
dataset.description: Ministry of Justice court statistics of completed criminal charges for adults (aged 17 years or more) charged in court.

distribution.description: Charges prosecuted again adults by offence ype
Adults prosecuted in court - most serious offence fiscal year
Adults convicted in court by sentence type+AD18

dataset.title: Crown Accounts Analysis
dataset.description: This recorded the financial transactions of ministers of the Crown, government departments, and offices of Parliament. It has been discontinued and replaced with the government sector accounts, which are released with the annual National Accounts information release each year.

distribution.title: Infoshare data tool
distribution.description: Select Group: Government finance, and Central Government Accounts

dataset.title: Crown Financial Information System
dataset.description: Crown Financial Information System (CFIS) is sourced from Treasury.  An analysis which records the financial transactions of the Crown with all other economic sectors, such as private enterprise, households, local government, state owned enterprises and the rest of the world, is also prepared from the data source.The financial data collected by CFIS is needed to compile quarterly and annual statistics on the performance of the New Zealand economy.  The information is used in the calculation of the Gross Domestic Product, which measures the value of goods less the cost of production.  The information is also used to compile the Analysis of the Crown Accounts.

distribution.title: Use Infoshare to view and download time-series data

dataset.title: Crown Research Institute Finances
dataset.description: This annual release provides provisional financial results of the nine Crown Research Institutes (CRIs). The activities of these institutes, which are in a number of different industries, are mainly focused on research and new product development.

distribution.title: Infoshare: to view & download time-series data
distribution.description: Select Subject categories: Government finances and select Group: Crown Research Instiytutes - CRI

dataset.title: Cruise Ship Traveller Statistics
dataset.description: Since the early 2000s, the number of cruise ships visiting New Zealand has increased significantly. From 2017, Stats NZ is publishing statistics on the number and characteristics of cruise ship travellers, including passengers and crew, and region/port statistics.

dataset.title: Deaths
dataset.description: These measure the number of deaths registered in New Zealand. Death statistics provide local authorities, health authorities, and research institutions with information needed to plan future and current social services.

distribution.title: Infoshare data tool
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Population, and Group: Deaths - VSD, Group: Death rates - DMM

distribution.title: Death data by statistical area 2 and area unit (comparison)

dataset.title: Disability Survey
dataset.description: Disability statistics provides information about children and adults with a disability living in New Zealand. This includes the numbers of people with a disability, the nature and cause of impairments and the type of support required.

dataset.title: District Health Board Financial Statistics
dataset.description: Statistics about district health boards provide information about the financial performance of publicly funded hospital and health service providers.

dataset.title: Divorces
dataset.description: Divorce statistics measure the number of dissolutions of marriage and civil unions that have orders granted in New Zealand.  Unless otherwise stated divorce statistics refer to orders for dissolution of both marriage and civil union granted in New Zealand.

distribution.title: Infoshare data tool
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Population, and select Groups: Marriage and Divorce Rates and Marriages Civil Unions and Divorces

dataset.title: Dwelling and Household Estimates
dataset.description: This provide estimates of all private dwellings in New Zealand at a given date, and estimates of all households usually living in New Zealand at a given date.

distribution.title: Infoshare: to view & download time-series data
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Population and Group: Demography dwelling and household estimates

dataset.title: Economic Survey of Manufacturing
dataset.description: The purpose of the Economic Survey of Manufacturing is to collect statistics from a cross section of New Zealand businesses involved in manufacturing. The financial data collected by this survey is used to produce a range of economic indicators. These statistics help government and other organisations in planning and decision making

distribution.title: Infoshare data tool
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Industry sectors, and select Group: Manufacturing survey (ANZSIC06)- MFG

dataset.title: Economy Wide Census 1987 Study Series
dataset.description: The Economy Wide Census 1987  covered most industrial activity, and provided the first comprehensive single year profile of the New Zealand economy.

dataset.title: Electronic Card Transactions
dataset.description: These releases provide information on the number and value of electronic card transactions with New Zealand-based merchants. Data includes transactions using debit (eftpos) cards, credit, and charge cards. Transactions by overseas cardholders in New Zealand are included; transactions by New Zealand cardholders overseas are excluded.
dataset.theme: Business, Economy, Industries, Retail and wholesale trade

distribution.title: Infoshare data tool
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Economic indicators and Group: Electronic card transactions (ANZSIC06) - ECT

dataset.title: Environmental Economic Accounts
dataset.description: Environmental-economic accounts explore how the environment and New Zealand economy interact. They measure the value and volume of many of New Zealand's natural resources, and identify which industries use them.

distribution.title: Timber physical stock account: 1995-2016 data - revised 9 April 2018
Water physical stock account livestock: 2007-16 data

dataset.title: Environmental Protection Expenditure
dataset.description: This series was part of an annual investigation into environmental protection expenditure and its importance to the New Zealand economy. Environment protection expenditure (EPE) is an internationally recognised term used to describe all goods and services aimed at protecting the environment and encouraging the sustainable use of the earths natural resources.

dataset.title: Food Price Index
dataset.description: These releases provide information on the rate of price change of food and food services purchased by households.

distribution.title: Infoshare data tool
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Economic indicators, and Group: Consumers price index - CPI

dataset.title: Geographic boundary data annual release
dataset.description: The Stats NZ geographic data serviceprovides geographic boundaries for 2018 as well as other recent years, and a selection of 2013 Censusspatial data.

distribution.description: Data is available in geospatial format via Datafinder data service

distribution.title: Infoshare data tool
distribution.description: Geographic units by industry and statistical area

dataset.title: Goods and Services Trade by Country
dataset.description: These releases provide statistics on imports and exports of both goods and services by country. They present a comprehensive view of economic trade between New Zealand and our main trading partners

dataset.title: Government Current Transactions
dataset.description: Government Current Transactions is a component of the Services item of New Zealand's Balance of Payments statement.

dataset.title: Government Finance Statistics (Central Government)
dataset.description: Government finance statistics (GFS) is a set of concepts and principles developed by the International Monetary Fund (IMF) specifically for measuring government financial activity. It was discontinued in 2016. Content previously available in this release is now available in Government Finance Statistics (General Government)

dataset.title: Government Finance Statistics (General Government)
dataset.description: Government Finance Statistics (GFS) is a set of concepts and principles developed by the International Monetary Fund (IMF) specifically for measuring government financial activity. General government includes both local and central government. Unlike accounting-based financial statements, GFS is an economic representation of a government's financial activity.

dataset.title: Gross Domestic Product - quarterly
dataset.description: These releases provide three-month snapshots of the performance of the economy. For production and expenditure-based gross domestic product (GDP) the information is published as chain-volume measures expressed in 1995/96 prices. For expenditure-based GDP the information is also expressed in current prices.

distribution.title: Infoshare data tool
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Economic indicators and Group: National accounts - SNA 2008

dataset.title: Historical de facto population estimates
dataset.description: De facto population estimates include all people present in New Zealand and counted by the census (census night population count). De facto estimates include visitors from overseas who are counted on census night, but exclude New Zealand residents who are temporarily overseas. The estimated de facto population at a given date after census includes births, deaths and net migration (arrivals less departures) of people during the period between census night and the given date. De facto population estimates are no longer produced.

dataset.title: Household Econmic Survey (Expenditure)
dataset.description: The Household Economic Survey (HES) is an annual survey that collects information on income, housing costs, material wellbeing and demographic information on households and individuals in New Zealand. There are three versions of the HES, including HES (Income), HES (Expenditure) and HES (Savings). The HES (Income) is the primary content and is collected every year, but combined with HES (Expenditure) and HES (Savings) alternately in the two years  in between the standalone HES every year.

dataset.title: Household Economic Survey
dataset.description: The Household Economic Survey (HES) is an annual survey that collects information on income, housing costs, material wellbeing and demographic information on households and individuals in New Zealand. There are three versions of the HES, including HES (Income), HES (Expenditure) and HES (Savings). The HES (Income) is the primary content and is collected every year, but combined with HES (Expenditure) and HES (Savings) alternately in the two years  in between the standalone HES every year.

dataset.title: Household Economic Survey (Income)
dataset.description: The Household Economic Survey (HES) is an annual survey that collects information on income, housing costs, material wellbeing and demographic information on households and individuals in New Zealand. There are three versions of the HES, including HES (Income), HES (Expenditure) and HES (Savings). The HES (Income) is the primary content and is collected every year, but combined with HES (Expenditure) and HES (Savings) alternately in the two years  in between the standalone HES every year.

dataset.title: Household Economic Survey (Savings)
dataset.description: The Household Economic Survey (HES) is an annual survey that collects information on income, housing costs, material wellbeing and demographic information on households and individuals in New Zealand. There are three versions of the HES, including HES (Income), HES (Expenditure) and HES (Savings). The HES (Income) is the primary content and is collected every year, but combined with HES (Expenditure) and HES (Savings) alternately in the two years  in between the standalone HES every year.

dataset.title: Household Labour Force Survey
dataset.description: This Survey is used to produce official estimates of the numbers of employed and unemployed people, those not in the labour force, and the official unemployment rate for New Zealand

dataset.title: Household Labour Force Survey Estimated Working-age Population
dataset.description: This provides an estimate of the working-age population. The working age population includes the usually resident, non-institutionalised, population of New Zealand aged 15 years and over. It is based on 2013 Census data and is updated using early estimates of births, deaths, and net permanent and long-term migration. Results from the Household Labour Force Survey are usually summed to this figure.

dataset.title: Household Living-costs Price Indexes
dataset.description: These releases provide information on the rate of price change for goods and services purchased by select household groups, providing a measure of inflation for sub-sections of the population.

dataset.title: Household Net Worth Statistics
dataset.description: Household net worth statistics give a picture of the net worth (wealth) of New Zealanders, by looking at their household assets - financial and non-financial - and their liabilities.

dataset.title: Human Resources Capability (HRC) Survey
dataset.description: The Human Resource Capability data collection is run annually and collects anonymous information about Public Service department employees, including staff numbers, pay, senior leaders, diversity and workplace wellbeing. The results provides trends and insights across the Public Service workforce. The results can be drawn on to monitor, plan and address present and future workforce issues at department and system levels.

dataset.title: Information and Communication Technology Supply Survey
dataset.description:
The Information and Communication Technology (ICT) Supply Survey measures the sale of goods and services from businesses associated with ICT industries. 

The ICT Supply Survey replaced the previous Stats NZ Information Technology (IT) Survey which ran from 1993 to 2004. The ICT Supply Survey was last run in 2017. There is currently no commitment to run this survey again.

dataset.title: Injury Statistics - Work-related Claims
dataset.description: These statistics provide information on claims accepted by Accident Compensation Corporation (ACC) for work-related injuries. This data is used for monitoring work-related injuries, and developing policy on reducing work-related injuries.

dataset.title: International Trade in Services and Royalties Survey
dataset.description: This survey is used to calculate New Zealand's imports and exports of services from other countries.

dataset.title: International Travel and Migration
dataset.description: International travel and migration statistics measure the number and characteristics of international arrivals into New Zealand, and international departures from New Zealand.

dataset.title: International Visitor Arrivals to New Zealand
dataset.description: International visitor arrivals to New Zealand provides monthly and annual data showing the number and characteristics of visitor arrivals.

dataset.title: Internet Service Providers Survey
dataset.description:
These releases provide information on numbers of Internet subscribers, Internet connection technology, spam, content and virus filtering, and barriers to internet service provider (ISP) growth in New Zealand. 

The ISP Survey has been conducted annually since 2009. Prior to that it was conducted six-monthly.

dataset.title: Labour Market Statistics
dataset.description: The Labour Market Statistics quarterly information release provides New Zealand's official employment and unemployment statistics and wage and salary information. They contain information previously published in the Household Labour Force Survey, Quarterly Employment Survey, and Labour Cost Index (Salary and Wage Rates) releases.

dataset.title: Linked Employee-Employer Data
dataset.description: These releases provide statistics on filled jobs, job flows, worker flows, mean and median earnings for continuing jobs and new hires, and total earnings.

dataset.title: Local Authority Census
dataset.description: This census collects financial information on the activities of all 12 regional councils and 73 territorial authorities responsible for local government in New Zealand. In addition, data from the Auckland Regional Transport Authority (ARTA) is included.

dataset.title: Local Authority Financial Statistics
dataset.description: This release presents annual accounting-based income, expenditure, and financial position information for each local authority in New Zealand

dataset.title: Local Authority Statistics (quarterly)
dataset.description: Local authority statistics are quarterly  estimates of the money local authorities in New Zealand earn and spend on their core business. Local authorities include city councils, district councils, unitary authorities, and regional councils.

dataset.title: Longitudinal Immigration Study of New Zealand
dataset.description: International visitor arrivals to New Zealand provides monthly and annual data showing the number and characteristics of visitor arrivals.

dataset.title: Maori Population Estimates
dataset.description: The census is used to provide an estimate of the Maori ethnic group living in New Zealand. This is based on the census usually resident population count of the Maori ethnic group with adjustments for Maori residents missed or counted more than once by the census, for Maori residents temporarily overseas on census night and for non-response to the census ethnicity question.

dataset.title: Marriages
dataset.description: Marriage statistics measure the number of marriages registered in New Zealand.

dataset.title: National Accounts - Income and Expenditure
dataset.description: This annual release provides information about income, expenditure, and saving for the six sectors of the economy:  non-financial businesses, financial businesses, general government, non-profit institutions serving households, households, and rest of the world. This replaces the Institutional Sector Accounts release.

dataset.title: National accounts - industry production and investment
dataset.description: This annual release contains detailed industry data on production, investment, and capital stock. This release replaces Institutional Sector Accounts, which was discontinued in November 2012.

dataset.title: National Accounts - Quarterlies
dataset.description: This release provides a snapshot of the performance of the economy. It uses production and expenditure based measures of GDP.

dataset.title: National Accounts (1994-2011)
dataset.description: The National Accounts releases provided statistics on economic aggregates such as gross domestic product, capital formation, and government and private consumption. This release has been discontinued. Content previously available in this release is now available in National Accounts (Income and Expenditure)

dataset.title: National Accounts input-output tables
dataset.description: Input-output tables are a powerful analytical tool for describing the structure of New Zealands economy. They show the relationships between industries, the goods and services they produce, and who uses them.

dataset.title: National Ethnic Population Projections
dataset.description: These releases provide a summary of the projected M?ori, Pacific, Asian, and 'European or Other'ethnic populations of New Zealand, based on different combinations of fertility, mortality, migration, and inter-ethnic mobility assumptions.

dataset.title: National Family and Household Projections
dataset.description: These releases provide a summary oftheprojected number of families and households in New Zealand, by family type and household type, based on different combinations of fertility, mortality, migration, and living arrangement assumptions.

dataset.title: National Labour Force Projections
dataset.description: National Labour Force Projections provide projected labour force in New Zealand, based on different combinations of fertility, mortality, migration and labour force participation rates assumptions

dataset.title: National Population Estimates
dataset.description: These provide national population estimates, including quarterly and annual changes in the resident population, and estimated population numbers for selected age groups.

dataset.title: National Population Projections
dataset.description: National Population Projections provide projected populations of New Zealand, based on different combinations of fertility, mortality, and migrationassumptions.

dataset.title: New Zealand Abridged Period Life Tables
dataset.description: Abridged period life tables for the total New Zealand male and female populations provide an indication of the trends in life expectancy between the construction of complete period life tables. Abridged life tables are available in February (provisional) and May (final) of each year.

dataset.title: New Zealand Business Demography Statistics
dataset.description:
These releases provide an annual snapshot of the structure and characteristics of New Zealand businesses.  
Statistics produced include counts of enterprises and geographic units by industry, region, institutional sector, business type, degree of overseas ownership, enterprise births, enterprise deaths, survival rate of enterprises and employment levels. The series covers economically significant private-sector and public-sector enterprises that are engaged in the production of goods and services in New Zealand.

dataset.title: New Zealand Cohort Life Tables
dataset.description: These compile detailed historical birth, death and migration data to produce life tables for each birth cohort (people born in each year) from 1876.

dataset.title: New Zealand Energy Use Survey
dataset.description: This survey collects statistics about the energy used by all types of New Zealand businesses, in the primary, industrial, trade, and services sectors. Organisations provide information on how much energy they use. The energy types include electricity, petrol, diesel, coal, natural gas, and renewable energy.

dataset.title: New Zealand Income Survey
dataset.description: This survey was discontinued in 2016. It provided income statistics alongside information about personal and household characteristics. This allowed for detailed information about the income of different groups and comparisons for groups across time. Some New Zealand Income Survey content has been integrated into the redeveloped Household Labour Force Survey.

dataset.title: New Zealand Period Life Tables
dataset.description: These complete period life tables indicate life expectancy and the mortality and survival experience at each single year of age for the total New Zealand, M?ori, non-M?ori, and Pacific male and female populations. They are typically derived every five years for a three-year period centred on a census year.

dataset.title: New Zealand Subnational Abridged Period Life Tables
dataset.description: Abridged period life tables for the total New Zealand male and female populations in different areas of New Zealand (eg regional council and territorial authority areas) provide an indication of the trends in life expectancy between the construction of complete period life tables. Abridged life tables are available in February (provisional) and May (final) of each year.

dataset.title: Non-profit Institutions Satellite Account
dataset.description: This measures and analyses the contribution of non-profit institutions to New Zealands economy. It includes an estimate of the contribution volunteers make to their activities.

distribution.title: Infoshare: to view & download time-series data

dataset.title: NZ's Environmental Reporting Series
dataset.description: Statistics and information about the state of the New Zealands environment, co-published by Statistics NZ and the Ministry for the Environment.

dataset.title: Overseas Investment in New Zealand Real Estate Individual Property
dataset.description: The Overseas Investment in New Zealand Real Estate Individual Property was part series of Annual Capital Accounts. The Annual Capital Accounts collected and published information about financial transactions and overseas ownership/equity relationships between New Zealand enterprises and the rest of the world.

distribution.title: Use Infoshare to view and download time-series data

dataset.title: Overseas Merchandise Trade
dataset.description: This information release provides statistical information on the importing and exporting of merchandise goods between New Zealand and other countries. Merchandise trade includes goods which add to or subtract from the material resources in New Zealand as a result of their movement in or out of the country. Data is obtained from the New Zealand Customs Service.

dataset.title: Overseas Trade Indexes (Prices and Volumes)
dataset.description: These releases provide information on how import and export prices and volume levels have changed between time periods. They measure changes in the levels of prices of imports and exports of services trade between New Zealand and the rest of the world.

dataset.title: Productivity Measures Statistics
dataset.description: Productivity statistics measure how efficiently inputs (capital and labour) are used within the economy to produce outputs.

dataset.title: Property Transfer
dataset.description: Property transfer statistics summarise the citizenship or visa status and tax residency of buyers and sellers of homes and land in New Zealand. They are are used to monitor tax obligations, and inform housing policy.

distribution.title: Infoshare data tool
distribution.description: Select Subject category: People and communities followed by Group: Property transfer statistics - PTS

distribution.title: Infoshare online tool
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Industry sectors, and select Group: Secondary Production- SEP

dataset.title: Regional Economic Indicator
dataset.description: The Regional Economic Indicator (REI) was an experimental time series, produced quarterly.  The REI produced GST Sales and GST Purchases at Regional Council Level by Industry and by Industrial sector. GST administrative data sourced from the Business Activity Indicator (BAI) is allocated to regional council level using business frame, business demography and meshblock data.  The REI was published in the Quarterly Regional Review, a customised output, offered to customers by subscription.  Data is also available directly on request.  The REI series is used by local government, economists, industry analysts and researchers.

distribution.title: Use Infoshare to view and download time-series data

dataset.title: Regional Gross Domestic Product
dataset.description: Regional gross domestic product (regional GDP) provides a breakdown of national-level GDP by regions. GDP is New Zealand's official measure of economic activity.

distribution.title: Infoshare data tool
distribution.description: Subject category: Economic indicators and Group: Regional gross domestic product - RNA

dataset.title: Research and Development Survey
dataset.description: These releases provide information on research and development (R&D) in New Zealand, including level of R&D activity, employment, and expenditure by private sector enterprises, government departments, government-owned trading entities, and universities.

dataset.title: Retail Trade Survey
dataset.description: The Retail Trade Survey measures the sales turnover and stock levels of a wide range of businesses that provide household and personal goods and services. This data is used to provide short-term economic indicators of the retail trade sector.

dataset.title: Screen Industry Survey
dataset.description: These releases provide information on businesses involved in the screen industry, including production and post production activities, film and video distribution, film exhibition, and television broadcasting.

dataset.title: Serious injury outcome indicators
dataset.description: Serious injury outcome indicators shows trends in fatal, serious non-fatal, and serious (fatal and non-fatal) injuries for the whole population, M?ori, and children (aged under 15 years).

distribution.title: Dataset using NZ.Stats online tool
distribution.description: Count of fatal and serious non-fatal injuries by sex, age group, ethnicity, cause, and severity of injury

dataset.title: Statistics NZ Annual Report (Financial Statements)
dataset.description: The financial statements in this report include an audit of a number of financial areas. These include the statement of financial position, statement of commitments, statement of contingent liabilities and contingent assets, the statement of comprehensive revenue and expense, statement of changes in equity, and statement of cash flows for the year ended on that date and the notes to the financial statements that include accounting policies and other explanatory information.

dataset.title: Statistics NZ submissions and advice to the Governance and Administration Select Committee (formerly known as Government and Administration Select Committee)
dataset.description: The Governance and Administration Select Comittee provide written advice in response to public submissons by the committees' offical advisers. Documents of interest relating to Statistics New Zealand include Quarterly Reports to the Minister, Statistics New Zealand's Reponse to Annual Review Questions.

dataset.title: Statistics NZ's Chief Executive Business Expense Disclosure
dataset.description: This documents business expenses and gifts incurred by the Government Statistician as Chief Executive for each financial year

distribution.title: Business expense disclosure
distribution.description: for 1 July 2017- 30 June 2018 period

dataset.title: Subnational Ethnic Population Projections
dataset.description: Subnational ethnic population projections indicate the future population living in New Zealand's 16 regional council areas (regions), 67 territorial authority areas (TAs), and 21 Auckland local board areas (LBAs) for four broad and overlapping ethnic groups: 'European or Other (including New Zealander)', M?ori, Asian, and Pacific.

dataset.title: Subnational Family and Household Projections
dataset.description: These releases provide a summary oftheprojected number of families and households in New Zealand, by family type and household type, based on different combinations of fertility, mortality, migration, and living arrangement assumptions.

dataset.title: Subnational Period of Life Tables
dataset.description: Thesesubnational period life tables indicate life expectancy and the mortality and survival experience atselected ages formale and female populations in different areas of New Zealand (eg regional council andterritorial authority areas). They are typically derived every five years for a three-year period centred on a census year

dataset.title: Subnational Population Estimates
dataset.description: These provide population estimates in the 16 regional council areas (regions), 67 territorial authority areas, and 21 Auckland local board areas (LBAs) of New Zealand. This includes quarterly and annual changes in the resident population, and estimated population numbers for selected age groups.

dataset.title: Subnational Population Projections
dataset.description: Subnational population projections give an indication of the future population usually living in the 16 regional council areas (regions), 67 territorial authority areas, and 21 Auckland local board areas (LBAs) of New Zealand. Three projections (low, medium, and high growth) incorporating different fertility, mortality, and migration assumptions for each geographic area have been produced to illustrate a range of possible scenarios.

dataset.title: The Hedging of Overseas Foreign Currency Liabilities Survey
dataset.description: The Hedging of Overseas Foreign Currency Liabilities Survey is a supplement of the Quarterly International Investment Survey (QIIS ). It asks for risk management information about respondent's foreign currency overseas liabilities.

dataset.title: Tourism Satellite Account
dataset.description: These releases provide a picture of the role tourism plays in New Zealand, including the changing levels and impact of tourism activity, and the industry's contribution to the economy

dataset.title: Transport Vehicle Registration
dataset.description: Transport vehicle registrations record motor vehicles currently licensed by type, and new and ex-overseas motor vehicles registered by type.

distribution.title: Infoshare online tool
distribution.description: Select Subject category: Industry sectors, and select Group: Transport - TPT

dataset.title: Value of Building Work Put in Place
dataset.description: These releases provide estimates of the actual dollar value of work put in place on construction jobs in New Zealand. It measures activity within the construction sector.

dataset.title: Well-being Statistics
dataset.description: Well-being statistics provide information on a wide range of social and economic outcomes, and how these outcomes are distributed across different groups within the New Zealand population aged 15 years and over.

dataset.title: Wholesale Trade Survey
dataset.description: Wholesale Trade statistics measure the sale or resale of new or used goods to retailers, including businesses or institutional users (including government). They provide short-term economic indicators for the wholesale trade sector.

dataset.title: Housing Net Worth Statistics
dataset.description: Household net worth statistics give a picture of the net worth (wealth) of New Zealanders, by looking at their household assets - financial and non-financial - and their liabilities.
